0100010000000000   // 1. LOAD R1, [0]
0100100000100000   // 2. LOAD R2, [1]
0000110010100000   // 3. ADD R3 = R1+R2
0110110001000000   // 4. STORE R3 → [2]
0101000001100000   // 5. LOAD R4, [3]
0001010110000000   // 6. SUB  R5 = R3–R4
0111010100000000   // 7. STORE R5 → [4]
0011101010000101   // 8. ADDI R6 = R5+5
0111101101000000   // 9. STORE R6 → [5]
0101110001100000   // 10. LOAD R7, [6]
0000011101100000   // 11. XOR R1 = R6^R7
0110011100000000   // 12. STORE R1 → [7]
0000100101110000   // 13. OR  R2 = R1 OR R7
0110100100000000   // 14. STORE R2 → [8]
0000110111000000   // 15. AND R3 = R2 AND R6
0110111001000000   // 16. STORE R3 → [9]
0001001001100001   // 17. SLL R4 = R3<<1
0111001000000000   // 18. STORE R4 → [10]
0011010010000001   // 19. ADDI R5 = R4+1
0111010101100000   // 20. STORE R5 → [11]
